name: Diescraper
description:
The zombie apocalypse has arrived! Escape the tower, descending through 100 levels of increasing difficulty without the ability to regain lost health whilst gunning down waves of zombies that swarm into your path.

How to Play:
- Kill the waves, don't get touched and head to the pink elevator square when advised!
- Pickup powerups to boost your speed or fire rate for a limited duration

WADS - Move
Mouse - Aim
LMB - Shoot

Diescraper was built in Unity over 3 hours on the 27th July 2022, streamed from start to finish over Twitch. Some audio and minor features were added just before submission, but I won't count that if you don't.
You can catch the streams over at https://www.twitch.tv/pixelcatdev/videos (coming to YouTube shortly) to see how the game was developed, but in the meanwhile, enjoy and don't forget to rate and let me know of any bugs!

- PixelCat

Credits:

Developed by Chris 'Pixelcat' Lupton
